Decatur.WDZ: WDZ (1050 kHz) is a commercial AM radio station licensed to Decatur, Illinois. It broadcasts a sports radio format. WDZ is owned by the Neuhoff Corporation, which also owns four other local radio stations, WCZQ, WDZQ, WSOY and WSOY-FM. Studios and offices are located on North Water Street and the transmitter is near St.
